backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two frontend requirements and the files they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes with global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon with basic metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Creates the TanStack router and renders it inside an error boundary with a fallback UI if router creation fails.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with add, remove, update, clear, and quantity lookup helpers.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items and overall cart state.
frontend/src/cart/cartUtils.ts: Utility functions for price parsing, formatting, and cart subtotal and count calculations.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartTo: Temporary toast component showing a brief animated 'added to cart' confirmation.
frontend/src/components/order/WhatsAppCh: Checkout form validating customer info and sending structured WhatsApp order messages using cart contents.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About page section describing the restaurant’s story and features using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact page section rendering address, phone, email, and hours from siteConfig using a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeHer: Hero section with background image, intro text, menu and Zomato buttons, and social links.
frontend/src/components/sections/MenuSec: Renders categorized menu items with images, pricing, veg indicators, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/sections/OrderSe: Deprecated section returning null; kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/components/site/SectionCont: Generic layout wrapper adding padding and container styling to a section.
Footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, social icons, and copyright.
Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and cart button with badge.
frontend/src/components/system/RenderErr: Error boundary component displaying a fallback UI and reload option on render failures.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Static site configuration including branding, contact info, social links, and delivery settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting all data is static and requires no queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the AboutSection component as the About page.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays cart items, totals, and checkout options including WhatsApp and Zomato flows.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the ContactSection component as the Contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the HomeHeroSection as the home page content.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Renders the MenuSection component as the Menu page.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides a signup form with validation and submits data via WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the root layout and all routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/menuImages.ts: Maps menu item names to predetermined image assets based on keyword matching.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp order messages and links for cart checkout actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s build state, required website features, architectural notes, and known issues for rebuilding a multi‑page Captain Pizza site with cart, checkout, WhatsApp/Zomato ordering, and updated contact details. Marks the current state as a fix request due to frontend load failures.
